detail.text: Page Structure: - Title integrated within main Section component - Organized into multiple subsections with titles - Clean sectioned layout with proper spacing
Loading State: - Shows spinner while loading data - Graceful error handling - Loading prop passed to main Section

Filter Controls: - Company: Multi-select dropdown (PTFI, PTBA, Inalum, Antam, Vale, Timah) - Project Phase: Multi-select dropdown (FEL 2, FEL 3, Detail Engineering, Construction, Commissioning, Operate Optimize) - Commodity: Multi-select dropdown (Nickel, Aluminium, Gold, Tin, Copper) - Date Range: Date range picker
Filter Actions: - Reset Filters button with reload icon - Apply Filters button with filter icon (primary style) - Responsive grid layout for filter controls
Project Counter: - Shows X of Y Projects counter - Secondary text styling - Positioned in dedicated section
Total Investment: - Donut chart visualization - Shows Upstream, Midstream, Downstream distribution - Brand-aligned colors (#1890ff, #52c41a, #fa8c16)

Total Project: - Large number display showing total projects (22) - SPI indicator with color coding (green if ≥1, red if <1) - CPI indicator with color coding (green if ≥1, red if <1) - High Risk count in red (#f5222d)
Company Distribution: - Donut chart showing company breakdown - Companies: PTFI, PTBA, Inalum, Antam, Vale, Timah - Brand-consistent color palette - Color-coded with legend
Project Objectives: - Vertical bar chart showing objectives A, B, C, D, E - Primary brand color (#1890ff) - Tooltips show full objective names
Project Phase: - Vertical bar chart - Phases: FEL 2, FEL 3, Detail Engineering, Construction, Commissioning, Operate Optimize - Brand-consistent color palette - Rotated labels for better readability
Commodity Distribution: - Vertical bar chart (improved from horizontal) - Commodities: Nickel, Aluminium, Gold, Tin, Copper - Consistent with other chart layouts - Rotated labels with proper spacing

Project Type: - Vertical bar chart - Types: New First Pass Substitute, New Missing Facilities, Major Modifications, Minor Plant Relocation, Life Support Relocation - Brand-aligned color scheme - Rotated labels with smaller font for readability
Color Scheme: - Primary Blue: #19315a - Primary Red: #c41e3a - Blue Light: #2a4a7a - Blue Hover: #21426e - Red Light: #d14458 - Blue Dark: #0f1e3a
detail.note: Updated to match official brand guidelines from theme.css

detail.text: Chart Consistency: - All bar charts use vertical orientation - Consistent tooltip styling - Uniform spacing and margins - Responsive design for all screen sizes
Data Source: - Uses dummy data from _data/index.js - Simulated API call with loading state - Filter state management with useState
Filter Functionality: - State-managed filter values - Reset filters functionality - Apply filters action (UI ready for backend integration) - Responsive filter layout
Responsive Design: - Grid layout with responsive columns - Charts resize automatically - Mobile-friendly layout - Section-based organization
Interactivity: - Tooltips on all charts - Legends for pie charts - Hover effects on chart elements - Filter control interactions
Menu Integration: - Available under Dashboard > Strategic Capital Project - Accessible to all roles
Route: - Path: /strategic-capital-project - Protected route within dashboard structure
